subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi and Thiago Alcantara led Barcelona to a 5-0 victory over Villarreal on Monday to open the defending champion’s campaign for a fourth straight Spanish league title.
snippet: Lionel Messi and Thiago Alcantara led Barcelona to a 5-0 victory over Villarreal on Monday to open the defending champion’s campaign for a fourth straight Spanish league title.
